extension.summary: aria2: the next generation download utility
extension.description: aria2 (1.35.0) is a lightweight multi-protocol and multi-source command-line download utility, which supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent and Metalink, and can be manipulated via built-in JSON-RPC and XML-RPC interfaces.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: Bazarr: subtitles for Sonarr and Radarr
extension.description: Bazarr (0.8.4.4) is a companion application to Sonarr and Radarr. It manages and downloads subtitles based on your requirements. You define your preferences by TV show or movies and Bazarr takes care of everything for you.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: Deluge: lightweight, free software, cross-platform BitTorrent client
extension.description: Deluge (2.0.3) is a lightweight, free software, cross-platform BitTorrent client.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: FlexGet: automate downloading or processing content from different sources
extension.description: FlexGet (3.1.60) is a program aimed to automate downloading or processing content (torrents, podcasts, etc.) from different sources like RSS-feeds, html-pages, various sites and more.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: Jackett: proxy to tracker sites
extension.description: Jackett (0.16.598) works as a proxy server: it translates queries from applications (CouchPotato, Mylar, SickRage, Sonarr, etc.) into tracker-site-specific HTTP queries, parses the HTML response, then sends results back to the requesting software. This allows for getting recent uploads (like RSS) and performing searches. Jackett is a single repository of maintained indexer scraping and translation logic, removing the burden from other applications.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: Lidarr: a music collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users
extension.description: Lidarr (0.7.1.1381) is a music collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new tracks from your favorite artists and will grab, sort and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: Medusa: automatic video library manager for TV shows
extension.description: Medusa (0.3.16) watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: NZBGet: efficient Usenet downloader
extension.description: NZBGet (21.0) is an efficient Usenet downloader.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: qBittorrent: efficient feature complete C++ bittorrent implementation
extension.description: qBittorrent (4.2.5) is an efficient feature complete C++ bittorrent implementation.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: Radarr: a fork of Sonarr to work with movies à la CouchPotato
extension.description: Radarr (0.2.0.1480) is a fork of Sonarr to work with movies à la CouchPotato.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: rTorrent: quick and efficient BitTorrent client
extension.description: rTorrent (0.9.8) is a quick and efficient BitTorrent client.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: ruTorrent: web front-end for rTorrent
extension.description: ruTorrent (3.10-beta) is a web front-end for rtorrent designed to emulate the look and feel of µTorrent web user interface.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: Sonarr: a PVR for Usenet and BitTorrent users
extension.description: Sonarr (3.0.3.845) is a PVR for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: Thoradia VPN Network Interface: a virtual private network interface
extension.description: Thoradia VPN Network Interface (3) provides the thoradia-vpn network interface to which applications can bind. The system continues using unmodified network configuration whereas applications bound to the thoradia-vpn network interface connect to the VPN. Thoradia VPN Network Interface is compatible with VPN Manager for OpenVPN.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: Thoradia Add-ons: add-on repository
extension.description: Thoradia Add-ons (24) add-on repository, provides aria2, Bazarr, btfs, CouchPotato, Deluge, FlexGet, Headphones, Jackett, Lidarr, Medusa, Mono, NZBGet, NZBHydra, qBittorent, Radarr, rTorrent, ruTorrent, SABnzbd, Sonarr, Thoradia VPN interface, Transmission and WebGrab+Plus.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on
extension.news: - Thoradia Add-ons version 24 - Split add-on versions in corresponding git branches

extension.summary: Transmission: a fast, easy and free BitTorrent client
extension.description: Transmission (3.00) is a fast, easy and free BitTorrent client.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.summary: WebGrab+Plus: a multi-site incremental xmltv epg grabber
extension.description: WebGrab+Plus (3.0.3_beta) collects tv-program guide data from selected tvguide sites for your favourite channels.

extension.summary: Mono: a cross platform, open source .NET framework
extension.description: Mono (6.8.0.123) is a software platform designed to allow developers to easily create cross platform applications part of the .NET Foundation.
